name: NL Netplay {} (NTSC)
description:
YOUR TAG IN THE DUTCH DISCORD MUST BE THE EXACT SAME AS YOUR TAG IN THE CHALLONGE TOURNAMENT OR YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO PLAY. We are using a bot to automate everything, but it requires the same names.
We are playing NTSC
Bo5 TBA.
Stagestrike via G&W side b (highest NR wins.)
You have 10minutes after your match is called to be present or you get Dq'd.
Laggers = DQ (Dutch connection gets priority unless its clear its their internet at fault.)
One setup per player. Setup sharing = DQ for both.
Sign up under your discord alias or get perma dq'd from this tournament.
